items.summary: Investigate and fix the issue where videos fail to load and display on the VideoPlayerPage. Ensure the video element is correctly sourced from the backend, the video URL or blob is properly constructed and passed to the HTML video element, and the player renders and plays the video without errors.
Ensure the video feed (VideoFeedPage) correctly displays video thumbnails or fallback placeholders for all uploaded videos, so users can identify and navigate to their content.
